description: Erection of one rear and one side roof dormer extension and installation of one front roof light to the house.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications:  LaVaastu/2024/377/02/Rev A; LaVaastu/2024/377/06/Rev A; LaVaastu/2023/377/07/Rev A; LaVaastu/2024/377/08/Rev A; LaVaastu/2024/377/09/Rev A Received:  21 April 2024;  LaVaastu/2024/377/01; LaVaastu/2024/377/03; LaVaastu/2024/377/04 Received:  19 April 2024.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Condition : 4 - The side roof dormer extension's side windows hereby approved shall be obscure glazed and non-openable below 1.75 metres above finished floor level.
Condition : 5 - No additional windows, doors or other glazed openings shall be formed in the rear and side roof dormer extensions hereby approved.
